name: MiFi M100
highlights:
4G LTE Data Capability
Connect up to 15 Wi-Fi enabled devices
Advanced security features
Mobile app available for advanced device management and customization
10 - hour battery outlasting a phone's mobile hotspot function
Fun, iconic, compact design
categoryIcons:
Access the 4G LTE network* to send and receive pictures, download music, watch videos and browse the Internet at speeds up to 10 times faster than 3G.
*4G LTE network available only in select cities. See coverage map

Data Plan Required
deviceFinancingTargeter: If you have financed your device, the financed installment amount is not displayed, and will increase the Total Due Monthly amount on your actual bill.

skuData.dealDescription: For a limited time, get incredibly low prices on devices that connect your whole life and enjoy up to $10 off your monthly connection charges. Applicable Shared Connect Plan. New 2-yr. agmt. $40 act. fee and credit approval required.
